goals__remit: The Reclay Group is an international recycling and waste management service provider. The medium-sized, owner-led group helps over 3000 customers from industry, trade and commerce achieve their environmental goals and fulfil their product responsibility. The Reclay Group develops and implements customized take-back and recycling systems for different types of waste such as transport and sale packaging. Reclay also advises companies and governments in the development and setup of waste management and recycling systems. The group also manages the processing and use of recycled materials, thus supplying the economy with important secondary raw materials. Specialist subsidiaries cover the entire value chain of waste management and recycling – with the aim of keeping recyclable materials in a closed loop system for as long as possible.
